title: China policy banks slash overseas energy finance to zero in 2021 - research - Reuters.com
content: China policy banks slash overseas energy finance to zero in 2021 - research  Reuters.com
description: China's two main trade policy banks made no new overseas energy finance commitments in 2021, a first for this century and a sign that Beijing's pledge to stop investing in foreign coal plants is already in effect, new research showed on Tuesday.
